text: 1-Benzyl-4-(2-(diphenylmethoxy)ethyl)piperidine is a stimulant of the piperidine class which acts as a potent and selective dopamine reuptake inhibitor. It is closely related to vanoxerine and GBR-12,935, which in contrast are piperazines. == See also == * Vanoxerine * GBR-12,935 * Desoxypipradrol == References == Category:Piperidines Category:Stimulants Category:Benzyl compounds
title: 1-Benzyl-4-(2-(diphenylmethoxy)ethyl)piperidine
